name: Town of Flower Mound GIS
description: The GIS portal provides interactive mapping and downloadable geospatial data for the Town of Flower Mound, featuring layers such as parcels, land use, streets, and more. Data is available in ESRI shapefile, KML, and spreadsheet formats, projected to North Central Texas State Plane (Zone 4202), NAD83, in US feet. Data is informational only and not guaranteed for legal or surveying purposes.
